content: i have designed this pattern to use just one cake of yarn bee sugarwheel cotton cakes because this yarn is 100% cotton you could also use it as a hot pad with confidence as you serve large casserole dishes this thanksgiving crochet tightly so as to not have snag-able loops reserve about 1/2 of the last color from the cake for the edging and border row pattern written using us terms see the video tutorial for this pattern https //www youtube com/watch v=j_zklfs-gu4
